description.narrative: Strengthening national capacity to address the environmental impacts of humanitarian responses to population displacement in Turkey

participating-org.narrative: Doğa Koruma Merkezi(The Nature Conservation Centre)

document-link.url: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/TUR/Initiation Plan- environment and social resilience UNEP.pdf

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Country has data-informed development and investment plans that incorporate integrated solutions to reduce disaster risks and enable climate change adaptation and mitigation
Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Financing frameworks
Country has gender-responsive measures in place for conservation, sustainable use, and equitable access to and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems: Policy frameworks
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With urban development plans and strategies in line with the New Urban Agenda under implementation
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With urban development plans and strategies in line with the New Urban Agenda under implementation

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At national level
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At sub-national level
Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With institutional frameworks for implementation in local and regional governments (LRGs)
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With institutional frameworks for implementation in local and regional governments (LRGs)
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With public-private partnerships at scale for accelerating catalytic LED initiatives
Country has inclusive local economic development (LED) strategies and plans in place: With public-private partnerships at scale for accelerating catalytic LED initiatives

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Growth in installed base of power generation from clean and/or renewable energy sources (If YES, please provide Number of installations)

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Solutions applied at scale to accelerate transition to improved energy efficiency and clean energy (If YES, please provide Number of solutions applied)

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Volume of investment leveraged from public and private sources through UNDP support for national programmes/initiatives (If YES, please provide volume of investment leveraged US$)
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice
National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
